## Getting to know I-Min Chen (Steven)

Steven is from Taiwan.
He received 2 bachelors degrees, one from Taiwan and one from Western Michigan in economics and finance and minored in business analytics.
With a background in business analytics, Steven wanted to further his career in data science and hopes to work in the healthcare industry.
Steven spent 4 months 2020 serving his country in the military.
He likes to play basketball during his off time and roots for the underdog teams.
